title: Bootstrap Navbar
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Navigation Header
The standard header for Bootstrap sites.

### Key Classes
* `.navbar`: Wrapper.
* `.navbar-expand-{lg}`: When to un-collapse (desktop view).
* `.navbar-brand`: Logo/Title.
* `.navbar-toggler`: Hamburger button.
* `.collapse.navbar-collapse`: The links to hide on mobile.

### Color Schemes
* `navbar-light bg-light`: Light header.
* `navbar-dark bg-dark`: Dark header (white text).

interview_questions.question: Difference between navbar-light and navbar-dark?
interview_questions.answer: navbar-light optimizes text color for light backgrounds (black text). navbar-dark optimizes text for dark backgrounds (white text). It does not set the background color itself.

real_world_use_cases.description: Standard responsive menu found on 90% of sites.
